nodes.text: The Keldrath sector was a sector located within the Tion Cluster of the Outer Rim region of the galaxy.

The region was discovered during the expansion of Xim the Despot's empire circa 25,100 BBY. It later formed the Keldrath Alignment, one of the many fiefdoms that formed from the remnants of Xim's empire. The Keldrath Alignment disappeared when the cluster joined the Republic. The region was integrated into the Tion Hegemony during the Old Republic era.
The sector was created on the same area as the Keldrath Alignment when the Galactic Empire split the Tion Hegemony into multiple sectors.
